tool.help:
This tool runs **Module 1** of the preprocessing pipeline.
### What it does - Performs adapter trimming and alignment. - Produces BAM alignment files (one per pair of input FASTQs). - Preserves original grouping (e.g., `healthy`, `covid`) in subdirectories under `$outputdir`.
### Inputs - **Path to Data**: Top-level folder containing input subdirectories. - **Data Subdirectory**: Subfolder under Path to Data (e.g., `healthy`). - **Adapter File**: Adapter sequences to trim. - **Genome Index**: Path to genome index for Bowtie2 aligner. - **Input Directory**: Location of preprocessing scripts. - **Output Directory**: Where the resulting BAM files will be stored.
### Outputs - **BAM collection**: All resulting `.bam` files discovered recursively from the output directory.
